name: FloppyKernel
changelog:
• Performance:
    • Force user processes to run as SCHED_RR (better latency).
    • Fixup some Ktweak values that weren't being applied correctly.
  • Power:
    • Fixup some wakelocks (attempt to fix delayed wakeup issue).
    • Fix overheating while charging in some cases.
  • Misc:
    • ptrace hide patch applied. (321e536).
    • Updated susfs to v1.5.9.
    • Updated KernelSU Next to v1.0.9.
    • Enable Bluetooth HID Protocol.
    • Only apply ZRAM size override once (to allow user to change it).
  • Device-specific:
    • Fix thermal nodes for laurel.
notes:
• Toolchain: AOSP Clang 21.0.0 r563880
  • Linux version: 4.14.364 (backports by OpenELA and cat65801)
  • Optimizations: -O2, LLVM Polly, tuned ThinLTO + LLVM inlining
  • Addons: KernelSU Next v1.0.9 + susfs v1.5.9 (unofficial)
  • Bugs: May experience delayed screen wake up.
